mapper.select: SELECT sa.account_number as accountNumber, sa.opener_id as openerId, sa.current_balance as balance, sa.saving_name as savingName, sa.progress_rate as progressRate, psd.image as categoryImg FROM saving_account sa join pet_saving_product psd on psd.category = sa.category WHERE opener_id = #{opener_id} AND pet_id = #{pet_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO saving_account(account_number, join_period, end_date, category, opener_id, saving_name, pet_id, final_amount, interest_amount) VALUES (#{account_number}, #{join_period}, TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{category}, #{guest_id}, #{saving_name}, #{pet_id}, #{final_amount}, #{interest_amount})
